subject: Re: Direct Recording...anyone, yet?  STEVE  BRUCE
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I know Frank does mostly direct recordings.  I have on occasion, but 
for the most part no.  My audio seems pretty clear without direct 
recording, so i stick with what works for me.  I don't seem to get a 
lot of noise from the speaker really.

-Steve H.
